comment.author: 92943860@N00
comment._content: The man indicated by the note is Julius Kambarage Nyerere the first President of Tanzania

comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: The people celebrated the announcement at the end of the Constitutional Conference in Dar es Salaam on 29 March1961 that Independence would come before the end of the year, with a triumphal motorcade procession through the city by the Chief Minister "Mwalimu"  Julius Nyerere, and they waved green foliage.
